components.name: SIA 380
components.description: Monthly heating, cooling and electricity demand calculation according to SIA 380

inputs.name: room_properties
inputs.description: room_properties as json. Could be from SIA 2024, or custom. But needs to follow sia2024-json syntax

inputs.name: T_e
inputs.description: Average monthly ambient air temperature in °C.

inputs.name: setpoints_ub
inputs.description: Monthly room temperature setpoint in °C (upper bound).

inputs.name: setpoints_lb
inputs.description: Monthly room temperature setpoint in °C (lower bound).

inputs.name: surface_areas
inputs.description: Surface areas of all external room surfaces in m2.

inputs.name: surface_type
inputs.description: Surface types of all external room surfaces. Either 'opaque' or 'transp'.

inputs.name: Q_s_per_surface
inputs.description: Monthly surface irradiation in Wh per surace. Jagged array [months_per_year][num_surfaces]

outputs.name: Q_Heat
outputs.description: Monthly heating loads of a room in kWh.

outputs.name: Q_Cool
outputs.description: Monthly cooling loads of a room in kWh.

outputs.name: Q_Elec
outputs.description: Monthly electricity loads of a room in kWh.

outputs.name: Q_T
outputs.description: Monthly transmission heat losses in Wh.

outputs.name: Q_V
outputs.description: Monthly ventilation heat losses in Wh.

outputs.name: Q_i
outputs.description: Monthly internal gains in Wh.

outputs.name: Q_s
outputs.description: Monthly solar gains in Wh.

components.name: Adaptive Comfort
components.description: Monthly adaptive thermal comfort temperature as a function of ambient air temperature. From PLEA Notes 3 - Thermal Comfort. Auliciems and Szokolay 2007.

inputs.name: T_m
inputs.description: Average monthly ambient air temperature in °C.

outputs.name: T_n
outputs.description: Monthly adaptive thermal comfort temperature in °C.

outputs.name: T_n80ub
outputs.description: Monthly adaptive thermal comfort temperature in °C (upper bound of 80% acceptance).

outputs.name: T_n80lb
outputs.description: Monthly adaptive thermal comfort temperature in °C (lower bound of 80% acceptance).

outputs.name: T_n90ub
outputs.description: Monthly adaptive thermal comfort temperature in °C (upper bound of 90% acceptance).

outputs.name: T_n90lb
outputs.description: Monthly adaptive thermal comfort temperature in °C (lower bound of 90% acceptance).

components.name: SIA 2024 room reader
components.description: Reads room values and properties from a SIA 2024 Json

inputs.name: room
inputs.description: Room type according to sia2024. should be a dictionary containing all properties.

inputs.name: area
inputs.description: Area in m². If no input given, default values as from SIA2024:2015 are used.

outputs.name: tau
outputs.description: Zeitkonstante des Gebäudes [h] - time constant

outputs.name: theta_i
outputs.description: Raumlufttemperatur

outputs.name: t
outputs.description: Länge der Berechnungsperiode [h]

outputs.name: A_op
outputs.description: Aussenwandfläche (opak) [m2]

outputs.name: A_w
outputs.description: Fensterfläche [m2]

outputs.name: U_op
outputs.description: Wärmedurchgangskoeffizient Aussenwand [W/m2K] - U value opaque walls

outputs.name: U_w
outputs.description: Wärmedurchgangskoeffizient Fenster [W/m2K] - U value windows

outputs.name: Vdot_e
outputs.description: Aussenluft-Volumenstrom [m3/h] - exterior air volume flow

outputs.name: Vdot_inf
outputs.description: Aussenluft-Volumenstrom durch Infiltration [m3/h] - infiltration air volume flow

outputs.name: eta_rec
outputs.description: Nutzungsgrad der Wärmerückgewinnung [-]

outputs.name: phi_P
outputs.description: Wärmeabgabe Personen [W] - heat release People

outputs.name: phi_L
outputs.description: Wärmeabgabe Beleuchtung [W] - heat release Lightning

outputs.name: phi_A
outputs.description: Wärmeabgabe Geräte [W] - heat release Appliances [W]

outputs.name: t_P
outputs.description: Vollaststunden Personen [h] - full load hours People

outputs.name: t_L
outputs.description: Vollaststunden Beleuchtung [h] - full load hours Lightning

outputs.name: t_A
outputs.description: Vollaststunden Geräte [h] - full load hours Appliances

outputs.name: g
outputs.description: g-Wert [-] - g-Value windows

outputs.name: f_sh
outputs.description: Reduktionsfaktor solare Wärmeeinträge [-]

parameters.name: RoomsStandard
parameters.description: A list of SIA2024 rooms, standard

parameters.name: RoomsExisting
parameters.description: A list of SIA2024 rooms, existing

parameters.name: RoomsIdeal
parameters.description: A list of SIA2024 rooms, ideal
